41 typedef struct{
42  GMainLoop *loop; /* the main Loop to quit and unref */
43  char *deamon_name; /* the deamon's nam to stop */
44 }stop_program_data;
45 
51 static gboolean stop_program ( gpointer data ){
52  stop_program_data *stop_data = data;
53  GMainLoop *loop = (GMainLoop *) stop_data->loop;
54 
55  g_info("Catch signal SIGINT or SIGTERM");
56 
57  g_debug("stop SNMP Sub-Agent");
58  /* Stop net snmp subAgent deamon */
59  snmp_shutdown(stop_data->deamon_name);
60  /* delete all streams associated to all channels */
61  struct channelTable_entry *iterator = channelTable_head;
62  struct channelTable_entry *temp;
63  while(iterator != NULL){
64  temp = iterator;
65  iterator = iterator->next;
66  if ( temp->channelType == videoChannel )
67  delete_steaming_data(temp);
68  }
69  free(deviceInfo.parameters);
70  /* free tables */
71  g_debug("free SNMP memory allocation: channelTable, videoFormatTable, ethernetIfTable");
72  /* channel table */
73  channelTable_delete();
74  /* videoFormatTable */
75  videoFormatTable_delete();
76  /* ethernetIfTable */
77  ethernetIfTableEntry_delete();
78 
79  g_message("last possible log before exiting the main loop");
80  /* unref and quit main loop */
81  g_main_loop_quit (loop);
82  g_main_loop_unref (loop);
83 
84  /* to exit the program we need to reset was_running variable */
85  exit(EXIT_SUCCESS);
86 
87  /* this is for the prototype, we should not get there */
88  return TRUE;
89 }
90 
95 static void default_startUp_mode(gpointer loop){
96 
97  g_debug("start defaultStartUp mode handling");
98 
99  for (int i=1; i<=channelNumber._value.int_val; i++){
100 
101  g_debug("starting channel: %d", i);
102 
103  struct channelTable_entry * entry = channelTable_getEntry(i);
104  if ( entry->channelType == serviceUser && entry->channelDefaultReceiveIpAddress ){
105  entry->channelStatus = channelStart;
106  entry->channelReceiveIpAddress = entry->channelDefaultReceiveIpAddress;
107  channelSatus_requests_handler( entry );
108  }
109  }
110 }
111 
112 /*
113  * \brief initialize the boolean "internal_error" to false before running the main loop
114  */
115 gboolean internal_error = FALSE;
116 
117 /*
118  * \brief initialize the boolean "was_runnig" to false before running the main loop
119  */
120 gboolean was_running = FALSE;
121 
122 gboolean vivoe_gstreamer_initiation(int argc, char *argv[]){
123 
124  g_debug("vivoe_gstreamer_initiation");
125 
126  gst_init (&argc, &argv);
127 
128  /*
129  * register vivoecrop plugin
130  */
131  g_debug("initiation of OpenVivoe's plugins");
132  if ( (! vivoecrop_init ()) || (! vivoecaps_init ()) )
133  g_error("Failed to load OpenVivoe's private gstreamer's modules");
134  else
135  return TRUE;
136 
137 }
138 
145 int main (int argc, char *argv[]){
146 
147  /* init OpenVivoe logger */
148  init_logger();
149 
150  /* create the GMainLoop*/
151  main_loop = g_main_loop_new (NULL, FALSE);
152 
153  g_info("starting the program");
154 
155  /* data associated to stream */
156  stop_program_data stop_data;
157  stop_data.deamon_name = argv[0];
158  stop_data.loop = main_loop;
159 
160  g_debug("adding signal handler fot SIGINT/SIGTERM");
161 
162  /* Exit the program nicely when kill signals are received */
163  g_unix_signal_add (SIGINT, stop_program, &stop_data);
164  g_unix_signal_add (SIGTERM, stop_program, &stop_data);
165 
166  /* In case of an service Provider */
167  /* Initialize GStreamer */
168  if ( !vivoe_gstreamer_initiation( argc, argv) )
169  return EXIT_FAILURE;
170 
171  /* init SubAgent Deamon */
172  if ( open_vivoe_daemon (argv[0]) )
173  return EXIT_FAILURE;
174 
175  gint snmp_hanlding_time = 100;
176  g_info("handle SNMP requests every %d ms", snmp_hanlding_time );
177  /* add the idle function that handle SNMP request every 100ms */
178  g_timeout_add (snmp_hanlding_time , handle_snmp_request, NULL);
179 
180  /* checking for start up mode */
181  if ( deviceInfo.parameters[num_DeviceMode]._value.int_val == defaultStartUp)
182  default_startUp_mode(main_loop);
183 
184  /* listen to SAP/SDP announcement */
185  if ( deviceInfo.parameters[num_DeviceType]._value.int_val == device_SU
186  || deviceInfo.parameters[num_DeviceType]._value.int_val == device_both)
187  g_timeout_add(1000, receive_announcement, NULL);
188 
189  /* iterate */
190  do {
191  /* Iterate */
192  if ( !internal_error){
193  was_running = TRUE;
194  g_main_loop_run (main_loop);
195  }
196  else{
197  g_error("A Gstreamer's error occurs");
198  return EXIT_FAILURE;
199  }
200 
201  }while(was_running);
202 
203  return EXIT_SUCCESS;
204 
205 }
